menu_text: Here you can Set-UP your hud, feel free to use your settings whatever you like.
hudtype_information: Here you can Set-UP your hud, feel free to use your settings whatever you like.
car_hudtype_information: Here you can Set-UP your hud, feel free to use your settings whatever you like.
maptype_information: You can choose the map shape you want to see here and customise it for yourself.
colors_information: You can set your huds and main colours as you wish, you can see them.
speedtype_information: Allows you to select the speed type you want to see in the speed meter system.
cinema_information: Turn on cinematic mode to make the game more beautiful
